meanings.definition: According to what is generally assumed or believed.
meanings.sent1: She supposedly finished her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The book supposedly tells the story of a magical land.
meanings.sent3: He supposedly has a pet dragon, according to his wild stories.
meanings.sent4: The treasure map supposedly leads to a hidden cave filled with gold.
meanings.sent5: The old house supposedly hides a ghost in its attic.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate that something is claimed to be true or to have taken place, although there is no proof.
meanings.sent1: The UFO supposedly landed in the field last night.
meanings.sent2: The potion supposedly grants wishes, but no one has seen it work.
meanings.sent3: The cat supposedly speaks French when no one is around.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious figure supposedly haunts the old graveyard at midnight.
meanings.sent5: The magic mirror supposedly shows your true self when you look into it.
